fields.description:
h5. Problem description
LiveView is not applying changes to a project build/run on Android Emulator, both classic or Alloy, from Appcelerator Studio or from Console CLI.
fields.summary: LiveView: no code changes are being applied on Android Emulator

comments.body: Verified fixed on Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.2.201308091728, OSX 10.8.3. This includes LiveView 0.1.32.
